actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution referring S. 1168 entitled "A bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Beniot, and for other purposes," to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report on bill.

summary.text: Refers S. 1168 (a bill for the relief of two named individuals and an individual's estate) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims for a report.

titles.title: A resolution referring S. 1168 entitled "A bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Beniot, and for other purposes," to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report on bill.
